Didier Kamanzi, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Rwanda. Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na ihe nkiri Rwandan, a maara Kamanzi nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Cwasa, Rwassibo na Catherine.
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye egwuregwu na otu egwuregwu rugby nke mba Rwanda.
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1994 na obodo Burundi dịka nwa nke atọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne isii
Mgbe mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Rwanda gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Rwanda n'afọ 1994 wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eche nche maka klọb abalị dị n'ógbè ahụ ruo ọnwa ole na ole.
Ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịla onye na-eche nche na klọb abalị, ọ nwetara onyinye ịnwale ihe nkiri
Ọ gara nyocha ma nweta ọrụ ahụ.
N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nrite ihe nkiri Rwandan.
